content: On Friday, an asteroid will give the Earth a close shave. What's the best way to deflect an asteroid? Tweet us your reply w/,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, cosmic shaving cream? ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, the best way to deflect an asteroid is to hire a group of ragtag oil drillers to place a bomb at the center. duh. ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, Shoot some politicians into space creating a black hole of ignorance to absorb the asteroid. ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, Ladies will want to deflect the asteroid gently but firmly, so there's no hurt feelings, but the message is still clear. ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, give everone an AK-47
@,scifri, Bruce Willis. ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, high powered laser
@,scifri, If we had a Death Star, it would be easy. But, nooooooo...
@,scifri, Could we modify earth orbit slightly?
@,scifri, keep an asteroid in an orbit around the earth. Slingshot it from  our atmosphere towards Armageddon a year before impact. Deflect!
@,scifri, Freakin sharks with freakin "lasers" on their heads?
@,scifri, By flying a space shuttle with lots of mass close enough to the asteroid to use gravity to shift its path. ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, change the asteroidâ€™s orbital path by lasers or blowing it up using nukes.
@,scifri, I'm going to guess it's not the Bruce Willis Solution in "Armageddon"...
@,scifri, better get Bruce Willis & his rag-tag team ready! ,@,jwduris, ,#,dontwanttoclosemyeyes
@,scifri, Divert all power to the main deflector. Oh, and change the gravitational constant of the universe. ,#,scifrichat
.,@,scifri,   how much time do I have? ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, launch politicians at it!!
@,scifri, Gary Busey
@,scifri, solar reflector in space to convert radiation into laser focused using lens to "nudge" while asteroids are far away ,#,scifrichat
@,scifri, duck and cover?
@,scifri, Have all the people with Telekinetic abilities focus on it at the prescribed time designated by NASA to push it out of the way.
@,scifri, Hire Bruce Willis!
@,scifri, Firing trash at it.
